title: Billionaire Blooms
overview: Billionaire Blooms follows internationally renowned florists as they deliver awe inspiring displays for exclusive venues and the most discerning private clients.The series is an insight into the unsung world of amazing design, meticulous planning and engineering of stunning floral installations on an epic scale, as cameras follow high end florists including the internationally renowned Jamie Aston as he plans and builds installations for his biggest gig of the year: a five-day wedding in Venice.
